Name: Name
Description: Simplified unique name of the player

Name: Current Cost
Description: Current cost of the player

Name: Fixture Cost
Description: Cost of the player at the time of the fixture.

Name: Field Position
Description: Position of the player. Either GK, DEF, MID, FWD.

Name: Total Points
Description: Total number of points this season

Name: Selected?
Description: Is the player in the user's team?

Name: Captain?
Description: Is the player selected to be the captain?

Name: Vice Captain?
Description: Is the player selected to be the vice captain?

Name: Points Per Cost
Description: Total number of points divided by the player cost. This is can be an indicator for whether the player is undervalued or overpriced.

Name: Minutes Percent
Description: Percent of total number of minutes played this season compared to maximum played by any player

Name: Minutes Played
Description: Number of minutes the player has played this season

Name: Percent Selected
Description: Percentage of participants who currently have the player in their team

Name: Fixture Percent Selected
Description: Percentage of participants who select the player for this fixture

Name: News And Date
Description: News about the players and the date when it was added

Name: Player Team ID
Description: ID of the team that the player is in

Name: First Name
Description: First name of the player

Name: Last Name
Description: Last name of the player

Name: Chance Avail Next GW
Description: Probability of the player will be available for playing the next game

Name: Chance Avail After Next GW
Description: Probability of the player will be available for playing the game after next

Name: Team Short Name
Description: Short name of the team

Name: Team Name
Description: Name of the team

Name: Team Short Name Home
Description: Team short name playing at home

Name: Team Name Home
Description: Team name playing at home

Name: Team Short Name Away
Description: Team short name playing at away

Name: Team Name Away
Description: Team name playing at away

Name: Expected Points Next GW
Description: Number of points that the player is expected to earn during the next game week

Name: Expected Points Next 5 GWs
Description: Number of points that the player is expected to earn over the next five game weeks

Name: Expected Points GWs To Half
Description: Number of points that the player is expected to earn over remaining game weeks of the current half season

Name: Expected Points GWs To End
Description: Number of points that the player is expected to earn over remaining game weeks of the current season

Name: Fixture Strength Home
Description: Strength of the home team for a specific fixture

Name: Fixture Strength Away
Description: Strength of the away team for a specific fixture

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength Home
Description: Strengh of the home team relative to the away team for a specific fixture

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength Away
Description: Strengh of the away team relative to the home team for a specific fixture

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength Finished GWs
Description: Average relative strengths of all completed fixtures (higher values indicate lower difficulty)

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength Next GW
Description: Average relative strengths of the next fixture (higher values indicate lower difficulty)

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength Next 5 GWs
Description: Average relative strengths of the next five fixtures (higher values indicate lower difficulty)

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength GWs To Half
Description: Average relative strengths of all fixtures left up to half of the season or the end of the season if the second half has started (higher values indicate lower difficulty)

Name: Rel. Fixture Strength GWs To End
Description: Average relative strengths of all fixtures left for the season (higher values indicate lower difficulty)

Name: Selling Price
Description: Money received when selling player

Name: Purchase Price
Description: Money spent when buying player

Name: Transfers In This GW
Description: Total number of participants buying the player for the upcoming game week. This is the transfer number displayed on the home page in the transfers section.

Name: Game Transfers In
Description: Total number of participants who bought the player for this fixture.

Name: Transfers Out This GW
Description: Total number of participants selling the player for the upcoming game week. This is the transfer number displayed on the home page in the transfers section.

Name: Game Transfers Out
Description: Total number of participants who sold the player for this fixture.

Name: Strength Attack Home
Description: Strength of attack when playing at home

Name: Strength Attack Away
Description: Strength of attack when playing at away

Name: Strength Defence Home
Description: Strength of defence when playing at home

Name: Strength Defence Away
Description: Strength of defence when playing at away

Name: Strength Overall Home
Description: Strength of defence and attack combined at home

Name: Strength Overall Away
Description: Strength of defence and attack combined away

Name: Started
Description: Whether the game has started

Name: Finished
Description: Whether the game has finished

Name: Next GW
Description: Number of game weeks left to the next game week for a specifc team. This is 1 except after the last game week

Name: Next 5 GWs
Description: Number of game weeks left to the over next five game weeks for a specific team. This is the minimum of 5 and the number of the gameweeks left for the current season

Name: Remaining GWs To Half
Description: Number of game weeks left to the end of the current half of the season for a specific team

Name: Remaining GWs
Description: Number of game weeks left to the end of the season for a specific team

Name: ICT Index
Description: ICT Index as calculated by Fantasy Premier Leauge

Name: Fixture Point Consistency
Description: The consistency of the points the player achieved in completed games during this seaon. It is the inverse of the standard deviation of the points, i.e. the higher the more consistent the points are.

Name: Team ID
Description: ID of the team that the player is in

Name: Field Position ID
Description: ID of the team that the player is in

Name: Fixture ID
Description: ID of the fixture

Name: Player ID
Description: ID of the player

Name: Game ICT Index
Description: ICT Index as calculated by Fantasy Premier Leauge at the time of the fixture

Name: Game Total Points
Description: Total points that the player was awarded for the fixture

Name: Game Minutes Played
Description: Number of minutes the player played at the fixture

Name: Away Team ID
Description: ID of the away team for the fixture

Name: Home Team ID
Description: ID of the home team for the fixture

Name: Away Team Score
Description: The goals scored by the away team

Name: Home Team Score
Description: The goals scored by the home team

Name: Away Team Difficulty
Description: The difficult score of the away team (1: Easy to 5: Difficult)

Name: Home Team Difficulty
Description: The difficult score of the home team (1: Easy to 5: Difficult)

Name: Game Week
Description: The game week of the fixture (1 to 38)

Name: Kick Off Time
Description: The kick off date and time of the fixture

Name: Fixture Minutes Played
Description: The minutes played at the fixture

Name: Team Position
Description: Position in the team selection, e.g. 0 is the goal keeper.

Name: Point Factor
Description: The multiplier for calculating the expected points at the team level. This value is 0 for players that are not selected, 2 for the captain and 1 for the rest.
